actions.name: Prideful
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPATK stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Affliction. If the user is afflicted with @Affliction[poison] or @Affliction[blight], their SPATK increases by 100% instead.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPATK stat increases by 50% if affected by a Major Status Affliction. If the user is afflicted with @Affliction[poison] or @Affliction[blight], their SPATK increases by 100% instead.
